sen.j: 三段池公園（さんだんいけこうえん）は、京都府福知山市にある公園。
sen.e: Sandanike-koen is a park located in Fukuchiyama City, Kyoto Prefecture.
Sandanike-koen is a park located in Fukuchiyama City, Kyoto Prefecture.
Sandanike-koen is a park located in Fukuchiyama City, Kyoto Prefecture.

sen.j: 福知山藩主 松平忠房により作られた潅漑用の池を中心に、市民の散策の場として整備された。
sen.e: It was built for the people of the city to stroll around an irrigation pond made by Tadafusa MATSUDAIRA who was a lord of Fukuchiyama han.
It was built as a place for the people of the city to stroll around, centering on an irrigation pond, and was made by Tadafusa MATSUDAIRA who was a lord of Fukuchiyama han.
It was built as a place for the people of the city to stroll around, centering on an irrigation pond, and was made by Tadafusa MATSUDAIRA who was a lord of the Fukuchiyama clan.

sen.j: 池の周囲に約1.3kmの散策道があり、周辺に各種施設を備える総合公園である。
sen.e: It is a comprehensive park with a walking trail of about 1.3 km around the pond, and various facilities in the neighborhood.
It is a comprehensive park with a walking trail of about 1.3 km around the pond, and various facilities in the neighborhood.
It is a comprehensive park with a walking trail of about 1.3 km around the pond, and various facilities in the neighborhood.

sen.j: 面積55.9ha。

It covers 55.9 ha.
It covers 55.9 ha.

sen.j: メインアリーナ、サブアリーナ、トレーニングジム、会議室、アトリエを備え、催し物会場としても使用される。
sen.e: It is equipped with the main arena, the sub arena, training gyms, meeting rooms, and art studios, and is also used for fairs or exhibitions arena.
It is equipped with a main arena, sub arena, training gyms, meeting rooms, and art studios, and is also used for fairs or as an exhibition arena.
It is equipped with a main arena, sub arena, training gyms, meeting rooms, and art studios, and is also used for fairs or as an exhibition arena.

sen.j: 福知山マラソンのスタート・ゴール地点となっている。

sen.j: ソフトテニスの全国・西日本・関西大会が開かれる。

sen.j: 猿ヶ島（猿山）は無料。

sen.j: 市街地を一望でき、花見もできる。
